nodes.body: Essential copulas express the nature or essence of the subject (equative meaning), or else an inherent quality of it (attributive meaning). They differ only in terms of the evidential mood that they convey. The assertive, egophoric, and revelatory moods are discussed below.
nodes.title: About The Essential Copulas: རེད་, ཡིན་, རེད་བཞག་

meta.title: About The Essential Copulas: རེད་, ཡིན་, རེད་བཞག་
